EmailTemplate.name: NA_Enterprise_Health Care_Cold_Nurture.Healthcare_Cold_Nurture_Enterprise_ES_7
EmailTemplate.subject: How are you assuring performance?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/6-1-highlight-reel]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
To be successful, the future of the data center and cloud must be powered by automation.
Whether you're leveraging on-premises, hybrid, or purely cloud, we can help. Turbonomic enables SMART (Self-Managing, Anywhere, in Real-Time) Workloads to continuously and most effectively choose the right infrastructure resources to meet the real-time and fluctuating demand requirements for any applications.
Would you like to take a closer look? Check out our Turbonomic highlight reel <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/introducing-turbonomic-6-1/6-1-highlight-reel]]> to learn more about how we can help!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
